sentences.en: After taking countermeasure to demolish the defective, this sort of quality problem was solved efficiently.
sentences.cn: 通过制定相应措施消除缺陷, 有效解决了该类质量问题.

sentences.en: All constructions besides accompany the palace to demolish, other preservation are complete.
sentences.cn: 所有建筑除陪殿已拆除外, 其余保存完好.

sentences.en: But is may demolish under the special situation.
sentences.cn: 但是在特殊情况下是可以拆除的.
黑暗 、 冬天和毁灭方面.

sentences.en: He demolished my argument in minutes.
sentences.cn: 他几分钟内就把我的论点驳倒了。

sentences.en: I can demolish every fortress if its foundations have not been set on stone.
sentences.cn: 只要碉堡的地基不是用石头筑的,我就能把它们都摧毁掉.

sentences.en: I'll demolish the first who puts me out of temper!
sentences.cn: 谁先惹我发脾气,我就斩掉谁.

sentences.en: Many people are now speculating whether we will demolish the Memorial Hall.
sentences.cn: 现在世界上都在猜测我们要毁掉纪念堂.

sentences.en: Mr Knee and colleagues demolish the business arguments derived from these banalities.
sentences.cn: 乔纳森?尼和他的同事推翻了由这种陈词滥调炎生出来的商业论断.

sentences.en: Our intention was to demolish the rumours that have surrounded him.
sentences.cn: 我们的目的是要彻底击破围绕他的那些谣言。

sentences.en: The entire east wing of the building was demolished in the fire.
sentences.cn: 大楼的整个东翼都被大火烧毁了。

sentences.en: The slapped man quickly squared off, British fashion, to demolish Abner.
sentences.cn: 挨耳光的水手立即拉开架势 -- 英国架势--要痛打艾布纳.

sentences.en: They would also like to demolish the atomic museum.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至还要毁掉原子弹纪念馆.

sentences.en: They'll demolish this house over my dead body.
sentences.cn: 我死也不让他们拆这所房子.

sentences.en: They're going to demolish that old building.
sentences.cn: 他们将拆毁那座旧建筑物.

sentences.en: To demolish ( a building ) by causing to collapse inward.
sentences.cn: 内爆拆除用造成内爆的方法拆除 ( 建筑物 )
一定要彻底驳倒这种言论.

trans.tran_cn: 毁坏, 破坏, 推翻, 粉碎
trans.tran_en: to prove that an idea or opinion is completely wrong

trans.tran_cn: 摧毁，拆毁（建筑物等），毁坏，破坏，推翻，驳倒（论点、理论等）
trans.tran_en: to prove that an idea or opinion is completely wrong
